verses.verse: Prayer for Breaking Away from the Treacherous. A Song of Ascents. In my trouble I cried to the LORD, And He answered me.
Rescue my soul, O LORD, from lying lips, And from a deceitful tongue.
What shall be given to you, and what more shall be done to you, You deceitful tongue?-
Sharp arrows of the warrior, With the burning coals of the broom tree.
Woe to me, for I sojourn in Meshech, and I live among the tents of Kedar [among hostile people]!
Too long my soul has had its dwelling With those who hate peace.
I am for peace, but when I speak, They are for war.
